markdownRemark.html:
I just installed Debian on an Asus eee PC, and I have to say that the Debian eee team has done a terrific job with this piece of equipment.

It would be totally excellent if there were more machines like this which could be supported in such a way.

What about FreeBSD?

  • http://wiki.freebsd.org/AsusEee
  • http://bsdimp.blogspot.com/2007/10/building-bootable-freebsdi386-images.html
  • OpenSolaris?
